method.name: Query
method.query: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema" xmlns:namesp2="http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <namesp1:Query xmlns:namesp1="http://vso1.nascom.nasa.gov/NASA/VSO/SOHOi"> <SOAP-ENC:Array xsi:type="SOAP-ENC:Array" SOAP-ENC:arrayType="namesp2:SOAPStruct[1]"> <item xsi:type="namesp2:SOAPStruct"> <src xsi:type="namesp2:SOAPStruct"> <instrument xsi:type="xsd:string">{0}</instrument> </src> </item> </SOAP-ENC:Array> <SOAP-ENC:Array xsi:type="SOAP-ENC:Array" SOAP-ENC:arrayType="namesp2:SOAPStruct[1]"> <item xsi:type="namesp2:SOAPStruct">{2}{3} </item> </SOAP-ENC:Array> </namesp1:Query> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>

format.time_start: <start xsi:type="namesp2:SOAPStruct"> <year xsi:type="xsd:int">{0}</year> <month xsi:type="xsd:int">{1}</month> <day xsi:type="xsd:int">{2}</day> <hour xsi:type="xsd:int">{3}</hour> <minute xsi:type="xsd:int">{4}</minute> <second xsi:type="xsd:int">{5}</second> </start>
format.time_end: <end xsi:type="namesp2:SOAPStruct"> <hour xsi:type="xsd:int">{3}</hour> <minute xsi:type="xsd:int">{4}</minute> <second xsi:type="xsd:int">{5}</second> <month xsi:type="xsd:int">{1}</month> <day xsi:type="xsd:int">{2}</day> <year xsi:type="xsd:int">{0}</year> </end>
